lyrics:
6 contributorswhat if his people prayed lyricsverse 1
what if the armies of the lord
picked up and dusted off their swords
vowed to set the captives free
and not let satan have one more
what if the church for heavens sake
finally stepped up to the plate
took and stand upon gods promise
and stormed hells rusty gates

chorus
what if his people prayed
and those who bear his name
would humbly seek his face yeah
and turn from their own way

verse 2
and what would happen if we prayed
for those raised up to lead the way
then maybe kids in school could pray
and unborn children see light of day
what if the life that we pursue
came from a hunger for the truth
what if the family turned to jesus
stopped asking oprah what to do
see casting crowns liveget tickets as low as 24you might also likechorus
what if his people prayed
and those who bear his name
would humbly seek his face yeah
and turn from their own way
he said that they would hear
his promise has been made
he’s answered loud and clear yeah
if only we would pray

bridge
if my people called by my name
if theyll humble themselves and pray
if my people called by my name
if theyll humble themselves and pray

chorus
what if his people prayed
if my people called by my name
and those who bear his name
would humbly seek his face yeah
if theyll humble themselves and pray
and turn from their own way
he said that they would hear
if my people called by my name
his promise has been made
he’s answered loud and clear yeah
if theyll humble themselves and pray
if only we would pray
outro
what if his people prayed2embed
